Package org.vanted.animation.animations

Class LabelColorAnimation

java.lang.Object
org.vanted.animation.Animation<T>
org.vanted.animation.ContinuousAnimation<ColorTimePoint>
org.vanted.animation.animations.ColorAnimation
org.vanted.animation.animations.LabelColorAnimation
public class LabelColorAnimation
extends ColorAnimation
Animates a label's color in a GraphElement object.
Author:
- Patrick Shaw
